comment._content: Kaiser (Emperor) Wilhelm ll, known by the British troops of the Great War (1914-18) as  "Kaiser Bill".

comment.author: 61849735@N00
comment._content: grandson of Queen Victoria and cousin to the king of England.

comment.author: 90983012@N00
comment._content: Cassies grandma is absolutely right ! The last German Emperor and King of Prussia, Kaiser Wilhelm II. (1859-1941) was the oldest grandson of the famous Queen Victoria of Great-Britain ! His Majesty was a Knight of the Most Noble Order of the Garter !

comment.author: 8623220@N02
comment._content: Thanks for the comments, everyone.  We will add to the source data, making it clear this is Kaiser Wilhelm II, 1859-1941, and then reload the description to Flickr.

comment.author: 61849735@N00
comment._content: He would also be cousin to the Czarina of Russia.  (the one that was murdered by the communists)

comment.author: 90983012@N00
comment._content:
Absolutely right, Cassies grandma. The last Empress of Russia was Princess Alix of Hesse and by Rhine (1872-1918)(Germany). She was like Kaiser Wilhelm a grandchild of Queen Victoria of Great Britain ! 
Her sister married the brother of Kaiser Wilhelm, His Royal Highness Prince Henry of Prussia (1862–1929) !

comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: caption reads "our Kaiser" , Kaiser being a version of Ceasar, The lower left is prepared by publishing house.... As with most published photos, his crippled left arm is in the less visible part of the photo.
